definition: fixing of farm output quotas for each household
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
system of quotas for farm output per household
collectivization of agriculture (disastrous policy of communist Russia around 1930 and China in the 1950s)
land reform/same as 土地改革[tu3 di4 gai3 ge2]
rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity
pinyin: nong2 cun1 jia1 ting2 lian2 chan3 cheng2 bao1 ze2 ren4 zhi4

definition: "land to the tiller", post-Liberation land reform movement instigated by the CCP
lit. to eat from the common pot (idiom)/fig. to be rewarded the same, regardless of performance

pinyin: nong2 ye4 sheng1 chan3 he2 zuo4 she4

definition: state monopoly of purchasing and marketing

(category defined by the Communist Party) poor and lower-middle peasants: farmers who, before land reform, possessed little or no land (poor peasants) and those who were barely able to support themselves with their own land (lower-middle peasants)
